entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
